title: Game Changer Chasing
text: Going out tonight, changes into something red Her mother doesn't that dress Everything she never had, she's showing up Driving too fast The moon is breaking through her hair She's heading for something that she won't forget Having no regrets is all that she really wants Only getting I've been thinking about you lately Good drive Just how fast you change everything that you've ever dreamed of Disappearing when you wake up, there's nothing to be afraid of Game changer Chasing it tonight, doubts are running round her head He's waiting, hides behind a cigarette Heart is beating loud and she doesn't want it to stop Moving too fast, the moon is lighting up her skin She's falling, doesn't even know it yet Having no regrets, it's all that she really wants Only getting the baby And I've been thinking about it lately Crazy, just self Changes, everything that you never think of Disappearing when you wake up There's nothing to be afraid of The night, changes, ever change Now tonight it changes into something red Her mother doesn't that dress Reminds her of a missing piece of innocence she loved But baby, I've been thinking about those in the drive But just now, change has let you ever disappear And to be Thank you for watching. You will never take the chain
summary: Having no regrets, it's all that she really wants Only getting I've been thinking about you lately Good drive Just how fast you change everything that you've ever dreamed of Disappearing when you wake up There's nothing to be afraid of The night, changes, ever change Now tonight it changes into something red Her mother doesn't that dress Reminds her of a missing piece of innocence she loved But just now, change has let you ever disappear .
